gobblin.source.extractor.extract.kafka.workunit.packer

Class KafkaAvgRecordSizeBasedWorkUnitSizeEstimator

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.source.extractor.extract.kafka.workunit.packer.KafkaAvgRecordSizeBasedWorkUnitSizeEstimator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KafkaWorkUnitSizeEstimator

    public class KafkaAvgRecordSizeBasedWorkUnitSizeEstimator
extends Object
implements KafkaWorkUnitSizeEstimator
    An implementation of KafkaWorkUnitSizeEstimator which uses the average record size of each partition to estimate the sizes of WorkUnits. Each partition pulled in the previous run should have an avg record size in its WorkUnitState. In the next run, for each partition the avg record size pulled in the previous run is considered the avg record size to be pulled in this run. If a partition was not pulled in the previous run, a default value of 1024 is used.
